15820506Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic partial class SomethingSomethingEntitiesDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public override int SaveChanges()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        tryDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            return base.SaveChanges();Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        catch (DbEntityValidationException ex)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            // Retrieve the error messages as a list of strings.Di2015NewLine            var errorMessages = ex.EntityValidationErrorsDi2015NewLine                    .SelectMany(x => x.ValidationErrors)Di2015NewLine                    .Select(x => x.ErrorMessage);Di2015NewLine    Di2015NewLine            // Join the list to a single string.Di2015NewLine            var fullErrorMessage = string.Join("; ", errorMessages);Di2015NewLine    Di2015NewLine            // Combine the original exception message with the new one.Di2015NewLine            var exceptionMessage = string.Concat(ex.Message, " The validation errors are: ", fullErrorMessage);Di2015NewLine    Di2015NewLine            // Throw a new DbEntityValidationException with the improved exception message.Di2015NewLine            throw new DbEntityValidationException(exceptionMessage, ex.EntityValidationErrors);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

15831389Di2015UniqueSeparatorstring BuildPattern(string h)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    StringBuilder sb = new StringBuilder();Di2015NewLine    string curPattern = "";Di2015NewLine    char curChar = ' ';Di2015NewLine    int cnt = 0;Di2015NewLine    foreach(Char c in h)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if(c != curChar && cnt != 0)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            sb.Append(curPattern);Di2015NewLine            sb.Append("{" + cnt.ToString() + "}");Di2015NewLine            cnt = 0;Di2015NewLine            curPattern = "";Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        curChar = c;Di2015NewLine        switch(c)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            case 'A':Di2015NewLine                curPattern = "[A-Za-z]";Di2015NewLine                cnt++;Di2015NewLine                break;Di2015NewLine            case 'X':Di2015NewLine                curPattern = "[A-Za-z0-9]";Di2015NewLine                cnt++;Di2015NewLine                break;Di2015NewLine            case 'N':Di2015NewLine                curPattern = "[0-9]";Di2015NewLine                cnt++;Di2015NewLine                break;Di2015NewLine            default:Di2015NewLine                sb.Append(c);Di2015NewLine                break;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    sb.Append(curPattern);Di2015NewLine    sb.Append("{" + cnt.ToString() + "}");Di2015NewLine    return sb.ToString();Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

15833899Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic class Bindable<T>Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    private T _value;Di2015NewLine    private PropertyChangedEventHandler _notifyHandler;Di2015NewLine    private INotifyPropertyChanged _notifyTarget;Di2015NewLine    private string _name;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public Bindable(PropertyChangedEventHandler notifyHandler, INotifyPropertyChanged notifyTarget, string name, T value = default(T), bool trigger = false)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        _value = value;Di2015NewLine        _name = name;Di2015NewLine        _notifyHandler = notifyHandler;Di2015NewLine        _notifyTarget = notifyTarget;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        if (trigger)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            _notifyHandler(_notifyTarget, new PropertyChangedEventArgs(_name));Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public implicit operator T(Bindable<T> bindable)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        return bindable._value;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public implicit operator Bindable<T>(T value)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        return new Bindable<T>(_notifyHandler, _notifyTarget, _name, value, true);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

15835964Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic abstract class BaseModel : IDataErrorInfo {Di2015NewLine    protected Type _type;Di2015NewLine    protected readonly Dictionary<string, ValidationAttribute[]> _validators;Di2015NewLine    protected readonly Dictionary<string, PropertyInfo> _properties;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public BaseModel() {Di2015NewLine        _type = this.GetType();Di2015NewLine        _properties = _type.GetProperties().ToDictionary(p => p.Name, p => p);Di2015NewLine        _validators = _properties.Where(p => _getValidations(p.Value).Length != 0).ToDictionary(p => p.Value.Name, p => _getValidations(p.Value));Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    protected ValidationAttribute[] _getValidations(PropertyInfo property) {Di2015NewLine        return (ValidationAttribute[])property.GetCustomAttributes(typeof(ValidationAttribute), true);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public string this[string columnName] {Di2015NewLine        get {Di2015NewLine            if (_properties.ContainsKey(columnName)) {Di2015NewLine                var value = _properties[columnName].GetValue(this, null);Di2015NewLine                var errors = _validators[columnName].Where(v => !v.IsValid(value)).Select(v => v.ErrorMessage).ToArray();Di2015NewLine                return string.Join(Environment.NewLine, errors);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            return string.Empty;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public string Error {Di2015NewLine        get { throw new NotImplementedException(); }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

15835984Di2015UniqueSeparatorsort
15835984Di2015UniqueSeparatorMerge.sort
15835984Di2015UniqueSeparatorms.sort
15835984Di2015UniqueSeparatorsort
15835984Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static void sort<T>(T[] a)Di2015NewLine    where T : IComparable<T>Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    sort(a, 0, a.Length);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepublic static void sort<T>(T[] a, int low, int high)Di2015NewLine    where T : IComparable<T>Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    int N = high - low;Di2015NewLine    if (N <= 1)Di2015NewLine        return;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    int mid = low + N / 2;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    sort(a, low, mid);Di2015NewLine    sort(a, mid, high);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    T[] aux = new T[N];Di2015NewLine    int i = low, j = mid;Di2015NewLine    for (int k = 0; k < N; k++)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (i == mid) aux[k] = a[j++];Di2015NewLine        else if (j == high) aux[k] = a[i++];Di2015NewLine        else if (a[j].CompareTo(a[i]) < 0) aux[k] = a[j++];Di2015NewLine        else aux[k] = a[i++];Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    for (int k = 0; k < N; k++)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        a[low + k] = aux[k];Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

15841955Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static IEnumerable<T[]> Split<T>(this IEnumerable<T> source, T separator)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    List<T> bucket = new List<T>();Di2015NewLine    var comparer = Comparer<T>.Default;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    foreach (var item in source)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (comparer.Compare(item, separator) != 0)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            bucket.Add(item);Di2015NewLine            continue;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        if (bucket.Any())Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            yield return bucket.ToArray();Di2015NewLine            bucket = new List<T>();Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    if (bucket.Any())        Di2015NewLine        yield return bucket.ToArray();        Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

15845070Di2015UniqueSeparator    public string toDecimalString()Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    StringBuilder b = new StringBuilder(9 * digits.Length);Di2015NewLine    var str = digits[0].ToString("D");Di2015NewLine    b.Append(str);Di2015NewLine    for (int i = 1; i < digits.Length; i++)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var str2 = digits[i].ToString("D9");Di2015NewLine        b.Append(str2);Di2015NewLine    }                Di2015NewLine    return b.ToString();Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
15845468Di2015UniqueSeparatoraH = Angle in the horizontal plane between the line of sight (LOS) and the object.  (angleHoriz)Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineaV = Angle in the vertical plane of the LOS.  (angleVert)Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLined = Distance to the object in the horizontal plane.  (distance)Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineh = Height of the object above the horizontal plane.  (height)Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinedO = Distance from the origin to the object.Di2015NewLine   = sqrt( d * d + h * h )Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineoH = Horizontal offset from the LOS to the object at the base of the wall.Di2015NewLine   = sin( aH ) * dDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLinedH = Horizontal distance from the origin to the wall.Di2015NewLine   = cos( aH ) * dDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLinehLOS = Height at which the LOS intersects the wall.Di2015NewLine     = tan( aV ) * dHDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLinedLOS = Distance from the observer to the LOS at the wall.Di2015NewLine     = sqrt( dH * dH + hLOS * hLOS )Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinedW = Distance along the wall between the line of sight and the object.Di2015NewLine   = sqrt( oH * oH + ( h - hLOS ) * ( h - hLOS ) )Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineanswer = acos( ( dLOS * dLOS + dO * dO - dW * dW ) / ( 2 * dLOS * dO ) )Di2015NewLine

15858933Di2015UniqueSeparatorSystem.Collections.IEnumerable
15858933Di2015UniqueSeparatorSystem.Collections.Generics.IEnumerable<T>
15858933Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static string dump(Object o)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    Type type = o.GetType();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // if it's a generic, check if it's a collection or keyvaluepairDi2015NewLine    if (type.IsGenericType) {Di2015NewLine        // a collection? iterate itemsDi2015NewLine        if (o is System.Collections.IEnumerable) {Di2015NewLine            StringBuilder result = new StringBuilder("{");Di2015NewLine            foreach (var i in (o as System.Collections.IEnumerable)) {Di2015NewLine                result.Append(dump(i));Di2015NewLine                result.Append(", ");Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            result.Append("}");Di2015NewLine            return result.ToString();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // a keyvaluepair? show key => valueDi2015NewLine        } else if (type.GetGenericArguments().Length == 2 &&Di2015NewLine                   type.FullName.StartsWith("System.Collections.Generic.KeyValuePair")) {Di2015NewLine            StringBuilder result = new StringBuilder();Di2015NewLine            result.Append(dump(type.GetProperty("Key").GetValue(o, null)));Di2015NewLine            result.Append(" => ");Di2015NewLine            result.Append(dump(type.GetProperty("Value").GetValue(o, null)));Di2015NewLine            return result.ToString();Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    // arbitrary generic or not genericDi2015NewLine    return o.ToString();Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

15861326Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic class ValueHolder<T> : INotifyPropertyChangedDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    private T _value;Di2015NewLine    public T ValueDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        get { return _value; }Di2015NewLine        setDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            if (!EqualityComparer<T>.Default.Equals(value, _value))Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                T old = _value;Di2015NewLine                _value = value;Di2015NewLine                OnPropertyChanged("Value");Di2015NewLine                OnValueChanged(old, value);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public ValueHolder()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public ValueHolder(T value)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        this._value = value;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public event EventHandler<ValueChangedEventArgs<T>> ValueChanged;Di2015NewLine    public event PropertyChangedEventHandler PropertyChanged;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    protected void OnValueChanged(T oldValue, T newValue)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var h = ValueChanged;Di2015NewLine        if (h != null)Di2015NewLine            h(this, new ValueChangedEventArgs<T>(oldValue, newValue));Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    protected virtual void OnPropertyChanged(string propName)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var h = PropertyChanged;Di2015NewLine        if (h != null)Di2015NewLine            h(this, new PropertyChangedEventArgs(propName));Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepublic class ValueChangedEventArgs<T> : EventArgsDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public T OldValue { get; set; }Di2015NewLine    public T NewValue { get; set; }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public ValueChangedEventArgs(T oldValue, T newValue)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        this.OldValue = oldValue;Di2015NewLine        this.NewValue = newValue;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepublic class MyCollection<T> : Collection<ValueHolder<T>>Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public void Add(T i)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        this.Add(new ValueHolder<T>(i));Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private void AddChangeHandler(ValueHolder<T> item)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        item.ValueChanged += item_ValueChanged;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private void RemoveChangeHandler(ValueHolder<T> item)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        item.ValueChanged -= item_ValueChanged;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    protected override void InsertItem(int index, ValueHolder<T> item)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        AddChangeHandler(item);Di2015NewLine        base.InsertItem(index, item);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    protected override void RemoveItem(int index)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        RemoveChangeHandler(this[index]);Di2015NewLine        base.RemoveItem(index);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    protected override void ClearItems()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        foreach (var item in this)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            RemoveChangeHandler(item);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        base.ClearItems();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    protected override void SetItem(int index, ValueHolder<T> item)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        RemoveChangeHandler(this[index]);Di2015NewLine e)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        ValueHolder<T> v = (ValueHolder<T>)sender;Di2015NewLine        for (int i = 0; i < this.Count; i++)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            if (this[i]    Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            if (Math.Abs(Y - DestinationY) > 5)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                if (Y < DestinationY)Di2015NewLine                    Y = Y + 5;Di2015NewLine                else if (Y > DestinationY)Di2015NewLine                    Y = Y - 5;    Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        public event PropertyChangedEventHandler PropertyChanged;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        protected virtual void OnPropertyChanged(string propertyName)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            Application.Current.Dispatcher.BeginInvoke((Action)(() =>Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    PropertyChangedEventHandler handler = PropertyChanged;Di2015NewLine                    if (handler != null) handler(this, new PropertyChangedEventArgs(propertyName)); 15867686Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static class GroupEnumerableDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public static IList<Group> BuildTree(this IEnumerable<Group> source)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var groups = source.GroupBy(i => i.ParentID);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        var roots = groups.FirstOrDefault(g => g.Key.HasValue == false).ToList();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        if (roots.Count > 0)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            var dict = groups.Where(g => g.Key.HasValue).ToDictionary(g => g.Key.Value, g => g.ToList());Di2015NewLine            for (int i = 0; i < roots.Count; i++)Di2015NewLine                AddChildren(roots[i], dict);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        return roots;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private static void AddChildren(Group node, IDictionary<int, List<Group>> source)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (source.ContainsKey(node.ID))Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            node.Children = source[node.ID];Di2015NewLine            for (int i = 0; i < node.Children.Count; i++)Di2015NewLine                AddChildren(node.Children[i], source);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        elseDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            node.Children = new List<Group>();Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

15871412Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static IEnumerable<string> RunCommands(params string[] commands) {Di2015NewLine    var process = new Process {Di2015NewLine        StartInfo = new ProcessStartInfo("cmd") {Di2015NewLine            UseShellExecute = false,Di2015NewLine            RedirectStandardInput = true,Di2015NewLine            RedirectStandardOutput = true,Di2015NewLine            CreateNoWindow = true,Di2015NewLine            Arguments = "/k",Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    };Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    process.Start();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    const string prompt = "--Prompt_C2BCE8F8E2C24403A71CA4B7F7521F5B_F659E9F3F8574A72BE92206596C423D5 ";Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // replacing standard prompt in order to determine end of command outputDi2015NewLine    process.StandardInput.WriteLine("prompt " + prompt);Di2015NewLine    process.StandardInput.Flush();Di2015NewLine    process.StandardOutput.ReadLine();Di2015NewLine    process.StandardOutput.ReadLine();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    var result = new List<string>();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    try {Di2015NewLine        var commandResult = new StringBuilder();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        foreach (var command in commands) {Di2015NewLine            process.StandardInput.WriteLine(command);Di2015NewLine            process.StandardInput.WriteLine();Di2015NewLine            process.StandardInput.Flush();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            process.StandardOutput.ReadLine();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            while (true) {Di2015NewLine                var line = process.StandardOutput.ReadLine();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                if (line == prompt) // end of command outputDi2015NewLine                    break;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                commandResult.AppendLine(line);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            result.Add(commandResult.ToString());Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            commandResult.Clear();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    } finally {Di2015NewLine        process.Kill();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    return result;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

15879057Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic bool ConnectTo(Node peerNode)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            EthernetPort peerPort   = peerNode.GetFreePort();Di2015NewLine            EthernetPort myPort     = this.GetFreePort();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // Perform a check for free ports for both peers:Di2015NewLine            if (peerPort == null || myPort == null)Di2015NewLine                return false; // Either myself or my peer do not have a spare port.Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // Perform a check to make sure these nodes aren't already connected:Di2015NewLine            if (this.HasConnectedNode(peerNode))Di2015NewLine                return false;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // Connect the two ports:Di2015NewLine            myPort.Connect(peerNode, peerPort);Di2015NewLine            peerPort.Connect(this, myPort);Di2015NewLine            return true;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLinepublic bool HasConnectedNode(Node node) {Di2015NewLine            foreach (var port in ethernetSwitch.ethernetPorts)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                if (port.peerNode == node)Di2015NewLine                    return true; // Found a port already connected to this node.Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            return false; // No port has this node connected to it.Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine

15880533Di2015UniqueSeparator% Sampling frequencyDi2015NewLineFs1 = 10e3;Di2015NewLineFs2 = 4e3;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine% Load your dataDi2015NewLiney = load('yourdata'); %y=sin(0:1/Fs1:1);Di2015NewLineTtime = (length(y)-1)*(1/Fs1);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine% X-AxisDi2015NewLinex  = 0:1/Fs1:Ttime;Di2015NewLinexi = 0:1/Fs2:Ttime;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine% Zero-order holdDi2015NewLineyi = zeros(length(xi),1);Di2015NewLinejj = 1;Di2015NewLinexi(1) = x(1);Di2015NewLinefor ii=2:length(y)Di2015NewLine    % Update valueDi2015NewLine    if (x(ii)>=xi(jj)),Di2015NewLine        yi(jj) = y(ii-1);Di2015NewLine        jj = jj+1;Di2015NewLine    endDi2015NewLineendDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine% PlotDi2015NewLinefigureDi2015NewLinehold onDi2015NewLinescatter(x,y,'b');Di2015NewLinescatter(xi,yi,'r');Di2015NewLinehold offDi2015NewLinelegend('Fs=10k','Fs=4k')Di2015NewLine

15883189Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic sealed class BooleanToVisibilityConverter : IValueConverterDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        public object Convert(object value, Type targetType, object parameter, CultureInfo culture)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            var flag = false;Di2015NewLine            if (value is bool)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                flag = (bool)value;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            else if (value is bool?)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                var nullable = (bool?)value;Di2015NewLine                flag = nullable.GetValueOrDefault();Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            if (parameter != null)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                if (bool.Parse((string)parameter))Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    flag = !flag;Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            return flag ? 15888018Di2015UniqueSeparatorExpressionVisitor:
15888018Di2015UniqueSeparatorIQueryable FixupExpressionTree( ObjectContext ctx, Type entityType, Expression expression )Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    var tObjectContext = ctx.GetType();Di2015NewLine    var mCreateObjectSetOpen = tObjectContext.GetMethod( "CreateObjectSet", new Type[ 0 ] );Di2015NewLine    var mCreateObjectSetClosed = mCreateObjectSetOpen.MakeGenericMethod( entityType );Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    var objectQuery = ( ObjectQuery ) mCreateObjectSetClosed.Invoke( ctx, null );Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    var eFixed = new Visitor( objectQuery, entityType ).Visit( expression );Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    var qFixed = ( ( IQueryable ) objectQuery ).Provider.CreateQuery( eFixed );Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    return qFixed;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

15888018Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic class Visitor : ExpressionVisitorDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    ObjectQuery _Source = null;Di2015NewLine    Type _EntityType = null;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public Visitor( ObjectQuery source, Type entityType ) { _Source = source; _EntityType = entityType; }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    protected override Expression VisitConstant( ConstantExpression node )Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if ( !node.Type.Name.Contains( "EnumerableQuery" ) ) return base.VisitConstant( node );Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        var eConstantInstance = Expression.Constant( _Source );Di2015NewLine        var eConstantArgument = Expression.Constant( MergeOption.AppendOnly );Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        var tObjectQueryOpen = typeof( ObjectQuery<> );Di2015NewLine        var tObjectQueryClosed = tObjectQueryOpen.MakeGenericType( _EntityType );Di2015NewLine        var eMergeAsMethod = tObjectQueryClosed.GetMethod( "MergeAs", BindingFlags.Instance | BindingFlags.NonPublic );Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        return Expression.Call( eConstantInstance, eMergeAsMethod, eConstantArgument );Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
15888018Di2015UniqueSeparatorType entityType = ...Di2015NewLineExpression expression = ...Di2015NewLineDbContext db = ...Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineObjectContext ctx = ( ( IObjectContextAdapter ) db ).ObjectContext;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineIQueryable query = FixupExpressionTree( ctx, entityType, expression );Di2015NewLine

15893314Di2015UniqueSeparatorusing System;Di2015NewLineusing System.Collections.Generic;Di2015NewLineusing System.Linq;Di2015NewLineusing System.Text;Di2015NewLineusing Roslyn.Compilers;Di2015NewLineusing Roslyn.Compilers.CSharp;Di2015NewLineusing Roslyn.Services;Di2015NewLineusing Roslyn.Services.CSharp;Di2015NewLineusing Roslyn.Compilers.Common;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineclass ProgramDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    static void Main(string[] args)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var code = @"enum E { V } class { static void Main() { string s = ""Value: "" + E.V; 15900554Di2015UniqueSeparatorusing System;Di2015NewLineusing System.Collections.Generic;Di2015NewLineusing System.ComponentModel;Di2015NewLineusing System.Windows;Di2015NewLineusing System.Windows.Interactivity;Di2015NewLineusing System.Windows.Media.Animation;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinenamespace TriggerTestDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    /// <summary>Di2015NewLine    /// InteractiveTrigger is a trigger that can be used as the System.Windows.Trigger but in the System.Windows.Interactivity.Di2015NewLine    /// <para>Di2015NewLine    /// Note: There is neither `EnterActions` nor `ExitActions` in this class. The `CommonActions` can be used instead of `EnterActions`.Di2015NewLine    /// Also, the `Actions` property which is of type System.Windows.Interactivity.TriggerAction can be used.Di2015NewLine    /// </para>Di2015NewLine    /// <para> </para>Di2015NewLine    /// <para>Di2015NewLine    /// There is only one kind of triggers (i.e. EventTrigger) in the System.Windows.Interactivity. So you can use the following triggers in this namespace:Di2015NewLine    /// <para>1- InteractiveTrigger : Trigger</para>Di2015NewLine    /// <para>2- InteractiveMultiTrigger : MultiTrigger</para>Di2015NewLine    /// <para>3- InteractiveDataTrigger : DataTrigger</para>Di2015NewLine    /// <para>4- InteractiveMultiDataTrigger : MultiDataTrigger</para>Di2015NewLine    /// </para>Di2015NewLine    /// </summary>Di2015NewLine    public class InteractiveTrigger : TriggerBase<FrameworkElement>Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        #region ___________________________________________________________________________________  PropertiesDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        #region ________________________________________  ValueDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        /// <summary>Di2015NewLine        /// [Wrapper property for ValueProperty]Di2015NewLine        /// <para>Di2015NewLine        /// Gets or sets the value to be compared with the property value of the element. The comparison is a reference equality check.Di2015NewLine        /// </para>Di2015NewLine        /// </summary>Di2015NewLine        public object ValueDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            get { return (object)GetValue(ValueProperty); }Di2015NewLine            set { SetValue(ValueProperty, value); }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        public static readonly DependencyProperty ValueProperty =Di2015NewLine            DependencyProperty.Register("Value",Di2015NewLine                                        typeof(object),Di2015NewLine                                        typeof(InteractiveTrigger),Di2015NewLine                                        new FrameworkPropertyMetadata(null, FrameworkPropertyMetadataOptions.None, OnValuePropertyChanged));Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        private static void OnValuePropertyChanged(DependencyObject sender, DependencyPropertyChangedEventArgs e)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            InteractiveTrigger instance = sender as InteractiveTrigger;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            if (instance != null)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                if (instance.CanFire)Di2015NewLine                    instance.Fire();Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        #endregionDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        /// <summary>Di2015NewLine        /// Gets or sets the name of the object with the property that causes the associated setters to be applied.Di2015NewLine        /// </summary>Di2015NewLine        public string SourceNameDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            get;Di2015NewLine            set;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        /// <summary>Di2015NewLine        /// Gets or sets the property that returns the value that is compared with this trigger.Value property. The comparison is a reference equality check.Di2015NewLine        /// </summary>Di2015NewLine        public DependencyProperty PropertyDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            get;Di2015NewLine            set;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        /// <summary>Di2015NewLine        /// Gets or sets a collection of System.Windows.Setter objects, which describe the property get;Di2015NewLine            set;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        /// <summary>Di2015NewLine        /// Gets or sets the collection of System.Windows.TriggerAction objects to apply when this trigger object becomes active.Di2015NewLine        /// </summary>Di2015NewLine        public List<System.Windows.TriggerAction> CommonActionsDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            get;Di2015NewLine            set;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        /// <summary>Di2015NewLine        /// Gets a value indicating whether this trigger can be active to apply setters and actions.Di2015NewLine        /// </summary>Di2015NewLine        private bool CanFireDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            getDi2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                if (this.AssociatedObject == null)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    return false;Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine                elseDi2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    object associatedValue;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                    if (string.IsNullOrEmpty(SourceName))Di2015NewLine                        associatedValue = this.AssociatedObject.GetValue(Property);Di2015NewLine                    elseDi2015NewLine                        associatedValue = (this.AssociatedObject.FindName(SourceName) as DependencyObject).GetValue(Property);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                    TypeConverter typeConverter = TypeDescriptor.GetConverter(Property.PropertyType);Di2015NewLine                    object realValue = typeConverter.ConvertFromString(Value.ToString());Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                    return associatedValue.Equals(realValue);Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        #endregionDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        #region ___________________________________________________________________________________  MethodsDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        /// <summary>Di2015NewLine        /// Fires (activates) current trigger by setting setter values and invoking all actions.Di2015NewLine        /// </summary>Di2015NewLine        private void Fire()Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            //Di2015NewLine            // Setting setters values to their associated properties..Di2015NewLine            //Di2015NewLine            foreach (Setter setter in Setters)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                if (string.IsNullOrEmpty(setter.TargetName))Di2015NewLine                    this.AssociatedObject.SetValue(setter.Property, setter.Value);Di2015NewLine                elseDi2015NewLine                    (this.AssociatedObject.FindName(setter.TargetName) as DependencyObject).SetValue(setter.Property, setter.Value);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            //Di2015NewLine            // Firing actions.. Di2015NewLine            //Di2015NewLine            foreach (System.Windows.TriggerAction action in CommonActions)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                Type actionType = action.GetType();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                if (actionType == typeof(BeginStoryboard))Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    (action as BeginStoryboard).Storyboard.Begin();Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine                elseDi2015NewLine                    throw new NotImplementedException();Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            this.InvokeActions(null);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        #endregionDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        #region ___________________________________________________________________________________  EventsDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        public InteractiveTrigger()Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine from the associated-object..Di2015NewLine                //Di2015NewLine                DependencyPropertyDescriptor dpDescriptor = DependencyPropertyDescriptor.FromProperty(Property, 15901435Di2015UniqueSeparatorbyte[] ObjectToByteArray(Object obj)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    if (obj == null)Di2015NewLine        return new byte[]{};Di2015NewLine    BinaryFormatter bf = new BinaryFormatter();Di2015NewLine    MemoryStream ms = new MemoryStream();Di2015NewLine    bf.Serialize(ms, obj);Di2015NewLine    return ms.ToArray();Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
15901435Di2015UniqueSeparatorstatic unsafe bool UnsafeCompare(byte[] a1, byte[] a2)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (a1 == null || a2 == null || a1.Length != a2.Length)Di2015NewLine            return false;Di2015NewLine        fixed (byte* p1 = a1, p2 = a2)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            byte* x1 = p1, x2 = p2;Di2015NewLine            int l = a1.Length;Di2015NewLine            for (int i = 0; i < l / 8; i++, x1 += 8, x2 += 8)Di2015NewLine                if (*((long*)x1) != *((long*)x2)) return false;Di2015NewLine            if ((l & 4) != 0) { if (*((int*)x1) != *((int*)x2)) return false; x1 += 4; x2 += 4; }Di2015NewLine            if ((l & 2) != 0) { if (*((short*)x1) != *((short*)x2)) return false; x1 += 2; x2 += 2; }Di2015NewLine            if ((l & 1) != 0) if (*((byte*)x1) != *((byte*)x2)) return false;Di2015NewLine            return true;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine
15901435Di2015UniqueSeparatorstatic bool ByteArrayCompare(byte[] a1, byte[] a2) Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    IStructuralEquatable eqa1 = a1;Di2015NewLine    return eqa1.Equals(a2, StructuralComparisons.StructuralEqualityComparer);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

// Until Eneter is not hit, the events arrive properlyDi2015NewLine                //Here starting to Unsubscribe for Events and Com Objects CleanUPDi2015NewLine                lCP.Unadvise(dwEventsCookie);Di2015NewLine                Marshal.ReleaseComObject(lCP); 15905341Di2015UniqueSeparator//requires query parameters to have names @0, @1 etc in stringDi2015NewLinepublic static List<object[]> Query(String query, params String[] parameters) //no injection check on this string, be careful.Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    using(SqlConnection conn = new SqlConnection(_CONN_STRING_))Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        conn.Open()Di2015NewLine        using(SqlCommand cmd = new SqlCommand(query, conn))Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            AddSqlParams(cmd, parameters);Di2015NewLine            return Query(cmd);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine/// <summary>Generic SQL query. Requires open connection.</summary>Di2015NewLine/// <param name="cmd">SqlCommand object with all necessary fields configured.</param>Di2015NewLine/// <returns>A list of Object arrays (each array is one row).</returns>Di2015NewLineprivate static List<Object[]> Query(SqlCommand cmd)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    List<Object[]> results = new List<Object[]>();Di2015NewLine    using (SqlDataReader rdr = cmd.ExecuteReader())Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        while (rdr.Read())Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            Object[] row = new Object[rdr.VisibleFieldCount];Di2015NewLine            rdr.GetValues(row);Di2015NewLine            results.Add(row);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        return results;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineprivate static void AddSqlParams(SqlCommand cmd, params String[] sqlParams)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    for (Int32 i = 0; i < sqlParams.Length; i++)Di2015NewLine        cmd.Parameters.AddWithValue("@" + i, (Object)sqlParams[i] ?? DBNull.Value);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

15908401Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static class LinqExtensionsDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLinepublic static IQueryable<TSource> WhereLike<TSource>(Di2015NewLine    this IQueryable<TSource> source,Di2015NewLine    Expression<Func<TSource, string>> valueSelector,Di2015NewLine    string value,Di2015NewLine    char wildcard)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    return source.Where(BuildLikeExpression(valueSelector, value, wildcard));Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        public static Expression<Func<TElement, bool>> BuildLikeExpression<TElement>(Di2015NewLine            Expression<Func<TElement, string>> valueSelector,Di2015NewLine            string value,Di2015NewLine            char wildcard)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            if (valueSelector == null)Di2015NewLine                throw new ArgumentNullException("valueSelector");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            var method = GetLikeMethod(value, wildcard);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            value = value.Trim(wildcard);Di2015NewLine            var body = Expression.Call(valueSelector.Body, method, Expression.Constant(value));Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            var parameter = valueSelector.Parameters.Single();Di2015NewLine            return Expression.Lambda<Func<TElement, bool>>(body, parameter);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        private static MethodInfo GetLikeMethod(string value, char wildcard)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            var methodName = "Equals";Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            var textLength = value.Length;Di2015NewLine            value = value.TrimEnd(wildcard);Di2015NewLine            if (textLength > value.Length)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                methodName = "StartsWith";Di2015NewLine                textLength = value.Length;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            value = value.TrimStart(wildcard);Di2015NewLine            if (textLength > value.Length)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                methodName = (methodName == "StartsWith") ? "Contains" : "EndsWith";Di2015NewLine                textLength = value.Length;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            var stringType = typeof(string);Di2015NewLine            return stringType.GetMethod(methodName, new Type[] { stringType });Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine

15911220Di2015UniqueSeparatorclass MyVisitor : ExpressionVisitorDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    protected override Expression VisitBinary(BinaryExpression node)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if(CheckForMatch(node.Left))Di2015NewLine            return Expression.Equal(node.Left, Rewrite(node.Right));Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        if(CheckForMatch(node.Right))Di2015NewLine            return Expression.Equal(Rewrite(node.Left), node.Right);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        return Expression.MakeBinary(node.NodeType, Visit(node.Left), Visit(node.Right));Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private bool CheckForMatch(Expression e)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        MemberExpression me = e as MemberExpression;Di2015NewLine        if(me == null)Di2015NewLine            return false;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        if(me.Member.Name == "RowKey" || me.Member.Name == "PartitionKey")Di2015NewLine            return true;Di2015NewLine        elseDi2015NewLine            return false;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private Expression Rewrite(Expression e)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        MethodInfo mi = typeof(Uri).GetMethod("EscapeDataString");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        return Expression.Call(mi, e);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

15914531Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static IEnumerable<ListPairing> PairUpLists(IEnumerable<int> sortedAList,Di2015NewLine                                                   IEnumerable<int> sortedBList)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    // Should wrap these two in using() per Servy's comment with braces aroundDi2015NewLine    // the rest of the method.Di2015NewLine    var aEnum = sortedAList.GetEnumerator();Di2015NewLine    var bEnum = sortedBList.GetEnumerator();Di2015NewLine    bool haveA = aEnum.MoveNext();Di2015NewLine    bool haveB = bEnum.MoveNext();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    while (haveA && haveB)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        // We still have values left on both lists.Di2015NewLine        int comparison = aEnum.Current.CompareTo(bEnum.Current);Di2015NewLine        if (comparison < 0)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            // The heads of the two remaining sequences do not match and A's isDi2015NewLine            // lower. Generate a partial pair with the head of A and advance theDi2015NewLine            // enumerator.Di2015NewLine            yield return new ListPairing() {ASide = aEnum.Current};Di2015NewLine            haveA = aEnum.MoveNext();Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        else if (comparison == 0)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            // The heads of the two sequences match. Generate a pair.Di2015NewLine            yield return new ListPairing() {Di2015NewLine                    ASide = aEnum.Current,Di2015NewLine                    BSide = bEnum.CurrentDi2015NewLine                };Di2015NewLine            // Advance both enumeratorsDi2015NewLine            haveA = aEnum.MoveNext();Di2015NewLine            haveB = bEnum.MoveNext();Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        elseDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            // No match and B is the lowest. Generate a partial pair with B.Di2015NewLine            yield return new ListPairing() {BSide = bEnum.Current};Di2015NewLine            // and advance the enumeratorDi2015NewLine            haveB = bEnum.MoveNext();Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    if (haveA)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        // We still have elements on list A but list B is exhausted.Di2015NewLine        doDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            // Generate a partial pair for all remaining A elements.Di2015NewLine            yield return new ListPairing() { ASide = aEnum.Current };Di2015NewLine        } while (aEnum.MoveNext());Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    else if (haveB)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        // List A is exhausted but we still have elements on list B.Di2015NewLine        doDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            // Generate a partial pair for all remaining B elements.Di2015NewLine            yield return new ListPairing() { BSide = bEnum.Current };Di2015NewLine        } while (bEnum.MoveNext());Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

15919951Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static string Magic_GetName<TClass>(Di2015NewLine    Expression<Func<TClass, object>> propertyExpression)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    propertyExpression.Dump();Di2015NewLine    var body = propertyExpression.Body as UnaryExpression;Di2015NewLine    if (body == null)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        throw new ArgumentException(Di2015NewLine            string.Format(Di2015NewLine                CultureInfo.InvariantCulture, Di2015NewLine                "The body of the 'propertyExpression' should be an " +Di2015NewLine                "unary expression, but it is a {0}", Di2015NewLine                propertyExpression.Body.GetType()));Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    var memberExpression = body.Operand as MemberExpression;Di2015NewLine    if (memberExpression == null)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        throw new ArgumentException(Di2015NewLine            string.Format(Di2015NewLine                CultureInfo.InvariantCulture, Di2015NewLine                "The operand of the body of 'propertyExpression' should " +Di2015NewLine                "be a member expression, but it is a {0}", Di2015NewLine                propertyExpression.Body.GetType()));Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    var propertyInfo = memberExpression.Member as PropertyInfo;Di2015NewLine    if (propertyInfo == null)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        throw new ArgumentException(Di2015NewLine            string.Format(Di2015NewLine                CultureInfo.InvariantCulture, Di2015NewLine                "The member used in the expression should be a property, " +Di2015NewLine                "but it is a {0}", Di2015NewLine                memberExpression.Member.GetType()));Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    return propertyInfo.Name;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

15921373Di2015UniqueSeparatorprivate Polyline polyline;Di2015NewLineprivate Polyline segment = new Polyline { StrokeThickness = 2 };Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineprivate void Canvas_MouseLeftButtonDown(object sender, MouseButtonEventArgs e)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    if (polyline == null)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var canvas = (Canvas)sender;Di2015NewLine        var point = e.GetPosition(canvas);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // create new polylineDi2015NewLine        polyline = new Polyline { Stroke = Brushes.Black, StrokeThickness = 2 };Di2015NewLine        polyline.Points.Add(point);Di2015NewLine        canvas.Children.Add(polyline);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // initialize current polyline segmentDi2015NewLine        segment.Stroke = Brushes.Red;Di2015NewLine        segment.Points.Add(point);Di2015NewLine        segment.Points.Add(point);Di2015NewLine        canvas.Children.Add(segment);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineprivate void Canvas_MouseMove(object sender, MouseEventArgs e)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    if (polyline != null)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        // update current polyline segmentDi2015NewLine        var canvas = (Canvas)sender;Di2015NewLine        segment.Points[1] = e.GetPosition(canvas);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        var distance = (segment.Points[0] - segment.Points[1]).Length;Di2015NewLine        segment.Stroke = distance >= 20 ? Brushes.Green : Brushes.Red;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineprivate void Canvas_MouseLeftButtonUp(object sender, MouseButtonEventArgs e)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    if (polyline != null)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var canvas = (Canvas)sender;Di2015NewLine        segment.Points[1] = e.GetPosition(canvas);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        var distance = (segment.Points[0] - segment.Points[1]).Length;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        if (distance >= 20)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            polyline.Points.Add(segment.Points[1]);Di2015NewLine            segment.Points[0] = segment.Points[1];Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        elseDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            if (polyline.Points.Count < 2)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                canvas.Children.Remove(polyline);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            polyline = null;Di2015NewLine            segment.Points.Clear();Di2015NewLine            canvas.Children.Remove(segment);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

15925566Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static IQueryable<T> OrderByDynamic<T>(this IQueryable<T> query, string sortColumn, bool descending) Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    // Dynamically creates a call like this: query.OrderBy(p => p.SortColumn)Di2015NewLine    var parameter = Expression.Parameter(typeof(T), "p");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    string command = "OrderBy";Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    if (descending))Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        command = "OrderByDescending";Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    Expression resultExpression = null;    Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    var property = typeof(T).GetProperty(sortColumn);Di2015NewLine    // this is the part p.SortColumnDi2015NewLine    var propertyAccess = Expression.MakeMemberAccess(parameter, property);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // this is the part p => p.SortColumnDi2015NewLine    var orderByExpression = Expression.Lambda(propertyAccess, parameter);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // finally, call the "OrderBy" / "OrderByDescending" method with the order by lamba expressionDi2015NewLine    resultExpression = Expression.Call(typeof(Queryable), command, new Type[] { typeof(T), property.PropertyType },Di2015NewLine       query.Expression, Expression.Quote(orderByExpression));Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    return query.Provider.CreateQuery<T>(resultExpression);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

OrbitRadius * Math.Cos(Angle * (3.141592654 / 180));Di2015NewLine        return Result;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private void drawPictureBox(Graphics graphics, bool ownGraphics)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private void DrawImage()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        double Angle = 0;Di2015NewLine        // Normally this is an expensive hardware call which I don't want to make more than Di2015NewLine        // once a second.Di2015NewLine        tryDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            Double.TryParse(AngleValueTextBox.Text, out Angle);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        catch (Exception e)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            MessageBox.Show("Could not parse Angle " +Di2015NewLine                             AngleValueTextBox.Text);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        using (Graphics gx = Graphics.FromImage(bitmap))Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            gx.Clear(BackColor);Di2015NewLine            double OrbitedCircleRadius = 40;Di2015NewLine            CircleCenterClass OrbitedCircleCenter = new CircleCenterClass(60, 60);Di2015NewLine            double OrbitingCircleRadius = 7;Di2015NewLine            Pen MyRedPen = new Pen(Color.Red, 2f);Di2015NewLine            Brush MyBlackBrush = new SolidBrush(Color.Black);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            gx.DrawEllipse(MyRedPen, (Int32)(OrbitedCircleCenter.X - OrbitedCircleRadius),Di2015NewLine                                            (Int32)(OrbitedCircleCenter.Y - OrbitedCircleRadius),Di2015NewLine                                            (Int32)(2 * OrbitedCircleRadius),Di2015NewLine                                            (Int32)(2 * OrbitedCircleRadius));Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            CircleCenterClass CircleCenter = GetCenterOfOrbitCircle(Di2015NewLine                                OrbitedCircleCenter, OrbitedCircleRadius,Di2015NewLine                                Angle);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            gx.FillEllipse(MyBlackBrush, (Int32)(CircleCenter.X - 15931278Di2015UniqueSeparatorinterface ICommand { }Di2015NewLineinterface IHandle<TCommand> where TCommand : ICommandDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    void Handle(TCommand command);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineclass CreateUserCommand : ICommand { }Di2015NewLineclass CreateUserHandler : IHandle<CreateUserCommand>Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public void Handle(CreateUserCommand command)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        Console.Write("hello");Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine[TestMethod]Di2015NewLinepublic void build_expression()Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    object command = new CreateUserCommand();Di2015NewLine    object handler = new CreateUserHandler();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    Action<object, object> dispatcher = BuildDispatcher(command.GetType());Di2015NewLine    dispatcher(handler, command);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineprivate static Action<object, object> BuildDispatcher(Type commandType)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    var handlerType = typeof(IHandle<>).MakeGenericType(commandType);Di2015NewLine    var handleMethod = handlerType.GetMethod("Handle");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    var param1 = Expression.Parameter(typeof(object));Di2015NewLine    var param2 = Expression.Parameter(typeof(object));Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    var handler = Expression.ConvertChecked(param1, handlerType);Di2015NewLine    var command = Expression.ConvertChecked(param2, commandType);Di2015NewLine    var call = Expression.Call(handler, handleMethod, command);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    var lambda = Expression.Lambda<Action<object, object>>(call, param1, param2);Di2015NewLine    return lambda.Compile();Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

15932652Di2015UniqueSeparatorPostCompleted
15932652Di2015UniqueSeparatorprivate bool hasCheckedExistingFolder = false;Di2015NewLineprivate string storedFolderID;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepublic void CreateFolder() {Di2015NewLine    LiveConnectClient liveClient = new LiveConnectClient(session);Di2015NewLine    // note that you should send a "liveClient.GetAsync("me/skydrive/files");" Di2015NewLine    // request to fetch the id of the folder if it already existsDi2015NewLine    if (hasCheckedExistingFolder) {Di2015NewLine      sendFile(liveClient, fileName, storedFolderID);Di2015NewLine      return;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    Dictionary<string, object> folderData = new Dictionary<string, object>();Di2015NewLine    folderData.Add("name", "Smart GTD Data");Di2015NewLine    liveClient.PostCompleted += onCreateFolderCompleted;Di2015NewLine    liveClient.PostAsync("me/skydrive", folderData);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineprivate void onCreateFolderCompleted(object sender, LiveOperationCompletedEventArgs e) {Di2015NewLine    if (e.Result == null) {Di2015NewLine        if (e.Error != null) {Di2015NewLine          onError(e.Error);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        return;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    hasCheckedExistingFolder = true;Di2015NewLine    // this is the ID of the created folderDi2015NewLine    storedFolderID = (string)e.Result["id"];Di2015NewLine    LiveConnectClient liveClient = (LiveConnectClient)sender;Di2015NewLine    sendFile(liveClient, fileName, storedFolderID);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

15935987Di2015UniqueSeparator    public class CacheHelperDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        private const int kMaxFileSize = 8000000;Di2015NewLine        private readonly int fFileSize;Di2015NewLine        private readonly string fFileName;Di2015NewLine        public CacheHelper(int sizeOfFile, string nameOfFile)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            fFileSize = sizeOfFile;Di2015NewLine            fFileName = nameOfFile;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        public CachingObjectHolder Split(byte[] file)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            var remainingSize = file.Length;Di2015NewLine            var partialList = new List<byte[]>();Di2015NewLine            var partial = new byte[file.Length > kMaxFileSize ? kMaxFileSize : file.Length];Di2015NewLine            for (int i = 0; i < file.Length; i++)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                if (i % kMaxFileSize == 0 && i > 0)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    partialList.Add(partial);Di2015NewLine                    partial = new byte[remainingSize > kMaxFileSize ? kMaxFileSize : remainingSize];Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                partial[i % kMaxFileSize] = file[i];Di2015NewLine                remainingSize--;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            partialList.Add(partial);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            return new CachingObjectHolder(fFileName, partialList);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        public static byte[] Join(CachingObjectHolder cachingObjectHolder)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            var totalByteSize = cachingObjectHolder.Partials.Sum(x => x.Length);Di2015NewLine            var output = new byte[totalByteSize];Di2015NewLine            var globalCounter = 0;Di2015NewLine            for (int i = 0; i < cachingObjectHolder.Partials.Count; i++)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                for (int j = 0; j < cachingObjectHolder.Partials[i].Length; j++)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    output[globalCounter] = cachingObjectHolder.Partials[i][j];Di2015NewLine                    globalCounter++;Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            return output;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        public static byte[] CreateFile(int size)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            var tempFile = Path.GetTempFileName();Di2015NewLine            using (var stream = new FileStream(tempFile, FileMode.OpenOrCreate))Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                using (var memStream = new MemoryStream())Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    stream.SetLength(size);Di2015NewLine                    stream.CopyTo(memStream);Di2015NewLine                    return memStream.ToArray();Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine
15935987Di2015UniqueSeparator    public class CacheDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        private const string kFileListName = "FileList";Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        public static DataCacheFactory DataCacheFactoryDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            getDi2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                return new DataCacheFactory();Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        private static DataCache fDataCache;Di2015NewLine        public static DataCache DataCacheDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            getDi2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                if(fDataCache == null)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    fDataCache = DataCacheFactory.GetDefaultCache();Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                return fDataCache;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        public static byte[] Get(string name)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            var dic = GetFileList();Di2015NewLine            if (dic == null)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                return (byte[])DataCache.Get(name);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            if (dic.ContainsKey(name))Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                var list = dic[name];Di2015NewLine                var input = new List<byte[]>();Di2015NewLine                var cache = DataCache;Di2015NewLine                list = list.OrderBy(x => x.Item2).ToList();Di2015NewLine                for (int i = 0; i < list.Count; i++)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    input.Add(cache.Get(list[i].Item1) as byte[]);Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                var holder = new CachingObjectHolder(name, input);Di2015NewLine                return CacheHelper.Join(holder);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            elseDi2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                return (byte[])DataCache.Get(name);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        public static void Put(string name, byte[] file)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            if (file.Length > CacheHelper.kMaxFileSize)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                var helper = new CacheHelper(file.Length, name);Di2015NewLine                var output = helper.Split(file);Di2015NewLine                var dic = GetFileList();Di2015NewLine                if (dic == null)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    dic = new Dictionary<string, List<Tuple<string, int>>>();Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                var partials = new List<Tuple<string, int>>();Di2015NewLine                for (int i = 0; i < output.CachingObjects.Count; i++)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    DataCache.Add(output.CachingObjects[i].Name, output.Partials[output.CachingObjects[i].Index]);Di2015NewLine                    partials.Add(new Tuple<string, int>(output.CachingObjects[i].Name, Di2015NewLine                                               output.CachingObjects[i].Index));   Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                dic.Add(name, partials.OrderBy(x => x.Item2).ToList());Di2015NewLine                PutFileList(dic);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            elseDi2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                DataCache.Add(name, file);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        public static void Remove(string name)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            var dic = GetFileList();Di2015NewLine            if (dic == null)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                DataCache.Remove(name);Di2015NewLine                return;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            if (dic.ContainsKey(name))Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                var list = dic[name];Di2015NewLine                for (int i = 0; i < list.Count; i++)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    DataCache.Remove(list[i].Item1);Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                dic.Remove(name);Di2015NewLine                PutFileList(dic);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            elseDi2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                DataCache.Remove(name);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        private static void PutFileList(Dictionary<string, List<Tuple<string, int>>> input)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            DataCache.Put(kFileListName, input);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        private static Dictionary<string, List<Tuple<string, int>>> GetFileList()Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            return DataCache.Get(kFileListName) as Dictionary<string, List<Tuple<string, int>>>;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine
15935987Di2015UniqueSeparator    public class CachingObjectHolderDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        public readonly List<byte[]> Partials;Di2015NewLine        public readonly List<CachingObject> CachingObjects;Di2015NewLine        public readonly string CacheName;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        public CachingObjectHolder(string name, List<byte[]> partialList)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            Partials = partialList;Di2015NewLine            CacheName = name;Di2015NewLine            CachingObjects = new List<CachingObject>();Di2015NewLine            CreateCachingObjects();Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        private void CreateCachingObjects()Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            for (int i = 0; i < Partials.Count; i++)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                CachingObjects.Add(new CachingObject(string.Format("{0}_{1}", CacheName, i), i));Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public class CachingObjectDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        public int Index { get; set; }Di2015NewLine        public string Name { get; set; }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        public CachingObject(string name, int index)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            Index = index;Di2015NewLine            Name = name;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine

15939899Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static bool IsYourLoginStillTrue(string userId, string sid)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    CapWorxQuikCapContext context = new CapWorxQuikCapContext();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    IEnumerable<Logins> logins = (from i in context.LoginsDi2015NewLine                                  where i.LoggedIn == true && i.UserId == userId && i.SessionId == sidDi2015NewLine                                  select i).AsEnumerable();Di2015NewLine    return logins.Any();Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepublic static bool IsUserLoggedOnElsewhere(string userId, string sid)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    CapWorxQuikCapContext context = new CapWorxQuikCapContext();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    IEnumerable<Logins> logins = (from i in context.LoginsDi2015NewLine                                  where i.LoggedIn == true && i.UserId == userId && i.SessionId != sidDi2015NewLine                                  select i).AsEnumerable();Di2015NewLine    return logins.Any();Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepublic static void LogEveryoneElseOut(string userId, string sid)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    CapWorxQuikCapContext context = new CapWorxQuikCapContext();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    IEnumerable<Logins> logins = (from i in context.Logins Di2015NewLine                                  where i.LoggedIn == true && i.UserId == userId && i.SessionId != sid // need to filter by user IDDi2015NewLine                                  select i).AsEnumerable();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    foreach (Logins item in logins)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        item.LoggedIn = false;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    context.SaveChanges();Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

15941434Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic class BaComp: IEqualityComparer<byte[]> {Di2015NewLine    public bool Equals (byte[] left, byte[] right) {Di2015NewLine        // Handle case where one or both is null (equal only if both are null).Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        if ((left == null) || (right == null))Di2015NewLine            return (left == right);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // Otherwise compare array sequences of two non-null array refs.Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        return left.SequenceEqual (right);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public int GetHashCode (byte[] key) {Di2015NewLine        // Complain bitterly if null reference.Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        if (key == null)Di2015NewLine            throw new ArgumentNullException ();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // Otherwise just sum bytes in array (one option, there are others).Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        int rc = 0;Di2015NewLine        foreach (byte b in key)Di2015NewLine            rc += b;Di2015NewLine        return rc;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

15946577Di2015UniqueSeparatorprivate MailMessage GetHtmlEmail()Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    MailMessage mail = new MailMessage();Di2015NewLine    XmlTextReader xReader = new XmlTextReader(Server.MapPath("PATH TO EMAIL.XML"));Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    while (xReader.Read())Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        switch (xReader.Name)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            case "ToAddress":Di2015NewLine                mail.To.Add(xReader.ReadElementContentAs(typeof(string), null).ToString());Di2015NewLine                break;Di2015NewLine            case "FromAddress":Di2015NewLine                mail.From = new MailAddress(xReader.ReadElementContentAs(typeof(string), null).ToString());Di2015NewLine                break;Di2015NewLine            case "Subject":Di2015NewLine                mail.Subject = xReader.ReadElementContentAs(typeof(string), null).ToString();Di2015NewLine                break;Di2015NewLine            case "EmailBody":Di2015NewLine                mail.Body = xReader.ReadElementContentAs(typeof(string), null).ToString();Di2015NewLine                break;Di2015NewLine            default:Di2015NewLine                break;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    return mail;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

15947100Di2015UniqueSeparatorclass FooDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public string A { get; set; }Di2015NewLine    public int B { get; set; }Di2015NewLine    public DateTime C { get; set; }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineclass FooDtoDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public string A { get; set; }Di2015NewLine    public int B { get; set; }Di2015NewLine    public DateTime C { get; set; }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineclass ProgramDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    static void Main(string[] args)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var data = new[] { new Foo { A = "a", B = 1, C = DateTime.Now}}Di2015NewLine                 .AsQueryable();Di2015NewLine        var mapped = PartialMap<Foo, FooDto>(data, "A", "C").ToList();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    static IQueryable<TTo> PartialMap<TFrom, TTo>(Di2015NewLine        IQueryable<TFrom> source, params string[] members)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var p = Expression.Parameter(typeof(TFrom));Di2015NewLine        var body = Expression.MemberInit(Expression.New(typeof(TTo)),Di2015NewLine            from member in membersDi2015NewLine            select (MemberBinding)Expression.Bind(Di2015NewLine                typeof(TTo).GetMember(member).Single(),Di2015NewLine                Expression.PropertyOrField(p, member))Di2015NewLine            );Di2015NewLine        return source.Select(Expression.Lambda<Func<TFrom, TTo>>(body, p));Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

15947263Di2015UniqueSeparatorusing System;Di2015NewLineusing System.Collections.Generic;Di2015NewLineusing System.Linq;Di2015NewLineusing System.Text;Di2015NewLineusing System.Windows.Forms;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinenamespace SimpleMathDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLinepublic class AEM : IOperationDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public static int[] Calculate(int i, int j)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        int[] ints = new int[] { i, j };Di2015NewLine        Array.Sort(ints);Di2015NewLine        List<int> powers = new List<int>();Di2015NewLine        int power = 1;Di2015NewLine        int first = ints[0];Di2015NewLine        int iReturn = 0;Di2015NewLine        int iReturnP = 0;Di2015NewLine        int iReturnN = 0;Di2015NewLine        doDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            powers.Add(power);Di2015NewLine            power = new Multiply().Calculate(power, 2);Di2015NewLine        } while (power <= first);Di2015NewLine        iReturnP += first;Di2015NewLine        while (first > 0)Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            int next = powers.LastOrDefault(x => x <= first);Di2015NewLine            first -= next;Di2015NewLine            int powertotal = new Multiply().Calculate(next, i);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            iReturnN += next;Di2015NewLine            iReturn += powertotal;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        return new int[]{iReturnP, iReturnN, iReturn};Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

Di2015NewLine   if(emailAddress.Length == 0)Di2015NewLine   {Di2015NewLine      errorMessage = "e-mail address is required.";Di2015NewLine         return false;Di2015NewLine   }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine   // Confirm that there is an "@" and a "." in the e-mail address, and in the correct order.Di2015NewLine   if(emailAddress.IndexOf("@") > -1)Di2015NewLine   {Di2015NewLine      if(emailAddress.IndexOf(".", emailAddress.IndexOf("@") ) > emailAddress.IndexOf("@") )Di2015NewLine      {Di2015NewLine         errorMessage = "";Di2015NewLine         return true;Di2015NewLine      }Di2015NewLine   }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine   errorMessage = "e-mail address must be valid e-mail address format.\\n" +Di2015NewLine      "For example 'someone@example.com' ";Di2015NewLine      return false;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

15950790Di2015UniqueSeparator static void Main(string[] args)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var strings = new[] { "1","2","3"};Di2015NewLine        var ints = strings.ConvertItems<string, int>().ToList();Di2015NewLine        var doubles = strings.ConvertItems<string, double>().ToList();Di2015NewLine        var nullableints = strings.ConvertItems<string, int?>().ToList();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public static IEnumerable<TargetType> ConvertItems<SourceType, TargetType>(this IEnumerable<SourceType> sourceCollection)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var targetType = typeof(TargetType);Di2015NewLine        if (targetType.IsGenericType && targetType.GetGenericTypeDefinition() == typeof(Nullable<>))Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            targetType = targetType.GetGenericArguments().First();Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        return sourceCollection.ConvertItems((source) => (TargetType)Convert.ChangeType(source, targetType));Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public static IEnumerable<TargetType> ConvertItems<SourceType, TargetType>(this IEnumerable<SourceType> sourceCollection, Converter<SourceType, TargetType> convertor)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        foreach (var item in sourceCollection)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            yield return convertor(item);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine
15950790Di2015UniqueSeparatorstatic void Main(string[] args)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var strings = new[] { "1","2","3"};Di2015NewLine        var ints = strings.ConvertItems(typeof(int));Di2015NewLine        var doubles = strings.ConvertItems(typeof(double));Di2015NewLine        var nullableints = strings.ConvertItems(typeof(int?));Di2015NewLine        foreach (int? item in nullableints)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            Console.WriteLine(item);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public static IEnumerable ConvertItems(this IEnumerable sourceCollection,Type targetType)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (targetType.IsGenericType && targetType.GetGenericTypeDefinition() == typeof(Nullable<>))Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            targetType = targetType.GetGenericArguments().First();Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        foreach (var item in sourceCollection)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            yield return Convert.ChangeType(item, targetType);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine

15953519Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic DateTime ExcelSerialDateToDT(int nSerialDate)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineint l = nSerialDate + 68569 + 2415019;Di2015NewLineint n = ((4 * l) / 146097);Di2015NewLinel = l - ((146097 * n + 3) / 4);Di2015NewLineint i = ((4000 * (l + 1)) / 1461001);Di2015NewLinel = l - ((1461 * i) / 4) + 31;Di2015NewLineint j = ((80 * l) / 2447);Di2015NewLineint nDay = l - ((2447 * j) / 80);Di2015NewLinel = (j / 11);Di2015NewLineint nMonth = j + 2 - (12 * l);Di2015NewLineint nYear = 100 * (n - 49) + i + l;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinereturn DateTime.Parse(nMonth + "/" + nDay + "/" + nYear);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine }Di2015NewLine

15954804Di2015UniqueSeparator    public static IEnumerable<List<T>> GroupSequential<T>(this IEnumerable<T> source, int groupSize, bool includePartialGroups = true)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (groupSize < 1)Di2015NewLine            throw new ArgumentOutOfRangeException("groupSize", groupSize, "Must have groupSize >= 1.");Di2015NewLine        var group = new List<T>(groupSize);Di2015NewLine        foreach (var item in source)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            group.Add(item);Di2015NewLine            if (group.Count == groupSize)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                yield return group;Di2015NewLine                group = new List<T>(groupSize);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        if (group.Any() && (includePartialGroups || group.Count == groupSize))Di2015NewLine            yield return group;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine

15960476Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static string ActionName<T>(Expression<Func<MyClass<T>, Action<T>>> expression)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    return GetMemberName(expression.Body);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLinepublic static string GetMemberName(Expression expression)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    switch (expression.NodeType)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        case ExpressionType.Lambda:Di2015NewLine            var lambdaExpression = (LambdaExpression)expression;Di2015NewLine            return GetMemberName(lambdaExpression.Body);Di2015NewLine        case ExpressionType.MemberAccess:Di2015NewLine            var memberExpression = (MemberExpression)expression;Di2015NewLine            var supername = GetMemberName(memberExpression.Expression);Di2015NewLine            if (String.IsNullOrEmpty(supername))Di2015NewLine                return memberExpression.Member.Name;Di2015NewLine            return String.Concat(supername, '.', memberExpression.Member.Name);Di2015NewLine        case ExpressionType.Call:Di2015NewLine            var callExpression = (MethodCallExpression)expression;Di2015NewLine            return callExpression.Method.Name;Di2015NewLine        case ExpressionType.Convert:Di2015NewLine            var unaryExpression = (UnaryExpression)expression;Di2015NewLine            return GetMemberName(unaryExpression.Operand);Di2015NewLine        case ExpressionType.Parameter:Di2015NewLine            return String.Empty;Di2015NewLine        default:Di2015NewLine            throw new ArgumentException(Di2015NewLine                "The expression is not a member access or method call expression");Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
