15960843Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic class DelegateCommand : ICommandDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    /// <summary>Di2015NewLine    /// Action to be performed when this command is executedDi2015NewLine    /// </summary>Di2015NewLine    private Action<object> executionAction;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    /// <summary>Di2015NewLine    /// Predicate to determine if the command is valid for executionDi2015NewLine    /// </summary>Di2015NewLine    private Predicate<object> canExecutePredicate;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    /// <summary>Di2015NewLine    /// Initializes a new instance of the DelegateCommand class.Di2015NewLine    /// The command will always be valid for execution.Di2015NewLine    /// </summary>Di2015NewLine    /// <param name="execute">The delegate to call on execution</param>Di2015NewLine    public DelegateCommand(Action<object> execute)Di2015NewLine        : this(execute, null)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    /// <summary>Di2015NewLine    /// Initializes a new instance of the DelegateCommand class.Di2015NewLine    /// </summary>Di2015NewLine    /// <param name="execute">The delegate to call on execution</param>Di2015NewLine    /// <param name="canExecute">The predicate to determine if command is valid for execution</param>Di2015NewLine    public DelegateCommand(Action<object> execute, Predicate<object> canExecute)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (execute == null)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            throw new ArgumentNullException("execute");Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        this.executionAction = execute;Di2015NewLine        this.canExecutePredicate = canExecute;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    /// <summary>Di2015NewLine    /// Raised when CanExecute is changedDi2015NewLine    /// </summary>Di2015NewLine    public event EventHandler CanExecuteChangedDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        add { CommandManager.RequerySuggested += value; }Di2015NewLine        remove { CommandManager.RequerySuggested -= value; }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    /// <summary>Di2015NewLine    /// Executes the delegate backing this DelegateCommandDi2015NewLine    /// </summary>Di2015NewLine    /// <param name="parameter">parameter to pass to predicate</param>Di2015NewLine    /// <returns>True if command is valid for execution</returns>Di2015NewLine    public bool CanExecute(object parameter)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        return this.canExecutePredicate == null ? true : this.canExecutePredicate(parameter);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    /// <summary>Di2015NewLine    /// Executes the delegate backing this DelegateCommandDi2015NewLine    /// </summary>Di2015NewLine    /// <param name="parameter">parameter to pass to delegate</param>Di2015NewLine    /// <exception cref="InvalidOperationException">Thrown if CanExecute returns false</exception>Di2015NewLine    public void Execute(object parameter)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (!this.CanExecute(parameter))Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            throw new InvalidOperationException("The command is not valid for execution, check the CanExecute method before attempting to execute.");Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        this.executionAction(parameter);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
15960843Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic class MainWindowViewModel : ViewModelBaseDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public MainWindowViewModel()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        this.LoadHomePage();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // Hook up Commands to associated methodsDi2015NewLine        this.LoadHomePageCommand = new DelegateCommand(o => this.LoadHomePage());Di2015NewLine        this.LoadSettingsPageCommand = new DelegateCommand(o => this.LoadSettingsPage());Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public ICommand LoadHomePageCommand { get; private set; }Di2015NewLine    public ICommand LoadSettingsPageCommand { get; private set; }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // ViewModel that is currently bound to the ContentControlDi2015NewLine    private ViewModelBase _currentViewModel;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public ViewModelBase CurrentViewModelDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        get { return _currentViewModel; }Di2015NewLine        setDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            _currentViewModel = value; Di2015NewLine            this.OnPropertyChanged("CurrentViewModel");Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private void LoadHomePage()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        CurrentViewModel = new HomePageViewModel(Di2015NewLine            new HomePage() { PageTitle = "This is the Home Page."});Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private void LoadSettingsPage()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        CurrentViewModel = new SettingsPageViewModel(Di2015NewLine            new SettingsPage(){PageTitle = "This is the Settings Page."});Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

 {Di2015NewLine            return _value;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public override void SetValue(double value)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        lock {Di2015NewLine        lock (_sync)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            return _value;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public override void }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLineclass Example3 : ExperimentDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    private readonly object _sync = new object();Di2015NewLine    private double _value = 3;Di2015NewLine    public override double GetValue()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        double result = 0;Di2015NewLine        lock (_sync)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            result = _value;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        return result;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public override void SetValue(double value)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        lock (_sync)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            _value = value;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineclass CompareExchange : ExperimentDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    private double _value = 3;Di2015NewLine    public override double GetValue()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        return Interlocked.CompareExchange(ref _value, 0, 0);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public override void SetValue(double value)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        Interlocked.Exchange(ref _value, value);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineclass ReadUnsafe : ExperimentDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    private long _value = DoubleToInt64(3);Di2015NewLine    static unsafe long DoubleToInt64(double val)Di2015NewLine    {   // I'm mainly including this for the field initializerDi2015NewLine        // in real use this would be manually inlinedDi2015NewLine        return *(long*)(&val);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    public override unsafe double GetValue()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        long val = Interlocked.Read(ref _value);Di2015NewLine        return *(double*)(&val);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public override void SetValue(double value)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        long intValue = DoubleToInt64(value);Di2015NewLine        Interlocked.Exchange(ref _value, intValue);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineclass UntypedBox : ExperimentDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    // references are always atomicDi2015NewLine    private volatile object _value = 3.0;Di2015NewLine    public override double GetValue()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        return (double)_value;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public override void SetValue(double value)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        object valueObject = value;Di2015NewLine        _value = valueObject;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineclass TypedBox : ExperimentDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    private sealed class BoxDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        public readonly double Value;Di2015NewLine        public Box(double value) { Value = value; }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    // references are always atomicDi2015NewLine    private volatile Box _value = new Box(3);Di2015NewLine    public override double GetValue()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        Box value = _value;Di2015NewLine        return value.Value;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public override void SetValue(double value)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        Box boxValue = new Box(value);Di2015NewLine        _value = boxValue;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLinestatic class ProgramDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    static void Main()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        // once for JITDi2015NewLine        RunExperiments(1);Di2015NewLine        // three times for realDi2015NewLine        RunExperiments(5000000);Di2015NewLine        RunExperiments(5000000);Di2015NewLine        RunExperiments(5000000);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    static void RunExperiments(int loop)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        Console.WriteLine("x{0}", loop);Di2015NewLine        RunExperiment(new Example1(), loop);Di2015NewLine        RunExperiment(new Example2(), loop);Di2015NewLine        RunExperiment(new Example3(), loop);Di2015NewLine        RunExperiment(new CompareExchange(), loop);Di2015NewLine        RunExperiment(new ReadUnsafe(), loop);Di2015NewLine        RunExperiment(new UntypedBox(), loop);Di2015NewLine        RunExperiment(new TypedBox(), loop);Di2015NewLine        Console.WriteLine();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    static void RunExperiment(Experiment test, int loop)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        // avoid any GC interruptionsDi2015NewLine        GC.Collect(GC.MaxGeneration, GCCollectionMode.Forced);Di2015NewLine        GC.Collect(GC.MaxGeneration, GCCollectionMode.Forced);Di2015NewLine        GC.WaitForPendingFinalizers();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        int threads = Environment.ProcessorCount;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        ManualResetEvent done = new ManualResetEvent(false);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // Since we use threads, divide the original workloadDi2015NewLine        //Di2015NewLine        int workerLoop = Math.Max(1, loop / Environment.ProcessorCount);Di2015NewLine        int writeRatio = 1000;Di2015NewLine        int writes = Math.Max(workerLoop / writeRatio, 1);Di2015NewLine        int reads = workerLoop / writes;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        var watch = Stopwatch.StartNew();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        for (int t = 0; t < Environment.ProcessorCount; ++t)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            ThreadPool.QueueUserWorkItem((state) =>Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    tryDi2015NewLine                    {Di2015NewLine                        double val = 0;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                        // Two loops to avoid comparison for % in the inner loopDi2015NewLine                        //Di2015NewLine                        for (int j = 0; j < writes; ++j)Di2015NewLine                        {Di2015NewLine                            test.SetValue(j);Di2015NewLine                            for (int i = 0; i < reads; i++)Di2015NewLine                            {Di2015NewLine                                val = test.GetValue();Di2015NewLine                            }Di2015NewLine                        }Di2015NewLine                    }Di2015NewLine                    finallyDi2015NewLine                    {Di2015NewLine                        if (0 == Interlocked.Decrement(ref threads))Di2015NewLine                        {Di2015NewLine                            done.Set();Di2015NewLine                        }Di2015NewLine                    }Di2015NewLine                });Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        done.WaitOne();Di2015NewLine        watch.Stop();Di2015NewLine        Console.WriteLine("{0}\\t{1}ms", test.GetType().Name,Di2015NewLine 15979864Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic class FooFactoryInstanceProvider : StandardInstanceProviderDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    protected override string GetName(MethodInfo methodInfo, object[] arguments)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        // harvest the 1st factory method arg, cast as appropriate Di2015NewLine        string fooParamOne = (string)arguments[0];  // ex. "Blue"Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // harvest the 2nd factory method arg, cast as appropriate Di2015NewLine        string fooParamTwo = (string)arguments[1];  // ex. "FiftyTwo"Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // manipulate the params to come up with the **Name** of the Di2015NewLine        //  IFoo implementation you wantDi2015NewLine        var fooName = GetFooName(fooParamOne, fooParamTwo);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        return fooName; // ex. "BlueFiftyTwoFoo"Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    protected override ConstructorArgument[] GetConstructorArguments(MethodInfo methodInfo, object[] arguments)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        // skip the number of params you're using above to come up with the implementation nameDi2015NewLine        return base.GetConstructorArguments(methodInfo, arguments).Skip(2).ToArray();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private string GetFooName(string fooParamOne, string fooParamTwo)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        // do that voodoo that you doDi2015NewLine        return fooParamOne + fooParamTwo + "Foo";Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

15981788Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic partial class MainWindow : WindowDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    private Timer _timer = new Timer(TimerCallback, null, 100, 100);Di2015NewLine    private static IAsyncResult _asyncResult;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public MainWindow()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        InitializeComponent();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    static void LongRunTime()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        Thread.Sleep(1000);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    void Window_Loaded(object sender, RoutedEventArgs args)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        Action myAction = () => LongRunTime();Di2015NewLine        _asyncResult = myAction.BeginInvoke(myAction.EndInvoke, null);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    static void TimerCallback(object obj)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (_asyncResult != null)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            bool called = ((dynamic)_asyncResult).EndInvokeCalled;Di2015NewLine            if (called)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                // Will hit this breakpoint after LongRuntime has completedDi2015NewLine                Debugger.Break(); Di2015NewLine                _asyncResult = null;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

15987581Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic string WrapText(SpriteFont spriteFont, string text, float maxLineWidth)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    string[] words = text.Split(' ');Di2015NewLine    StringBuilder sb = new StringBuilder();Di2015NewLine    float lineWidth = 0f;Di2015NewLine    float spaceWidth = spriteFont.MeasureString(" ").X;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    foreach (string word in words)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        Vector2 size = spriteFont.MeasureString(word);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        if (lineWidth + size.X < maxLineWidth)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            sb.Append(word + " ");Di2015NewLine            lineWidth += size.X + spaceWidth;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        elseDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            sb.Append("\\n" + word + " ");Di2015NewLine            lineWidth = size.X + spaceWidth;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    return sb.ToString();Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

15994732Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static class CryptoSerivcesDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine        //---------------------------------------------------------------------Di2015NewLine        public static Byte[] AesEncrypt(Byte[] src, Byte[] key, Byte[] IV)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            using (RijndaelManaged myRijndael = new RijndaelManaged())Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                tryDi2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    myRijndael.Mode = CipherMode.CBC;Di2015NewLine                    myRijndael.Key = key;Di2015NewLine                    myRijndael.IV = IV;Di2015NewLine                    myRijndael.Padding = PaddingMode.PKCS7;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                    using (ICryptoTransform encryptor = myRijndael.CreateEncryptor())Di2015NewLine                    using (MemoryStream msEncrypt = new MemoryStream())Di2015NewLine                    using (CryptoStream csEncrypt = new CryptoStream(msEncrypt, encryptor, CryptoStreamMode.Write))Di2015NewLine                    {Di2015NewLine                        csEncrypt.Write(src, 0, src.Length);Di2015NewLine                        csEncrypt.FlushFinalBlock();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                        return msEncrypt.ToArray();Di2015NewLine                    }Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine                finallyDi2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    myRijndael.Clear();Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine CipherMode.CBC;Di2015NewLine                myRijndael.Key = key;Di2015NewLine                myRijndael.IV = IV;Di2015NewLine                myRijndael.Padding = PaddingMode.PKCS7;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                using (ICryptoTransform decryptor = myRijndael.CreateDecryptor())Di2015NewLine                using (MemoryStream msDecrypt = new MemoryStream())Di2015NewLine                using (CryptoStream csDecrypt = new CryptoStream(msDecrypt, decryptor, CryptoStreamMode.Write))Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            finallyDi2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                myRijndael.Clear();Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

15995403Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static List<InfoNode> ExpandObject(InfoGrid grid, InfoNode owner, object obj)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    List<InfoNode> nodes = new List<InfoNode>();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    if (obj == null)Di2015NewLine        return nodes;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    PropertyInfo[] infos = obj.GetType().GetProperties(BindingFlags.FlattenHierarchy | BindingFlags.Instance | BindingFlags.Public);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    foreach (PropertyInfo info in infos)Di2015NewLine        nodes.Add(new PropertyNode(grid, owner, obj, info));Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    nodes = nodes.OrderBy(n => n.Name).ToList();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    return nodes;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

15998683Di2015UniqueSeparator    public static Image ResizeImage(Image img, int minsize) {Di2015NewLine        var size = img.Size;Di2015NewLine        if (size.Width >= size.Height) {Di2015NewLine            // Could be: if (size.Height < minsize) size.Height = minsize;Di2015NewLine            size.Height = minsize;Di2015NewLine            size.Width = (size.Height * img.Width + img.Height - 1) / img.Height;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        else {Di2015NewLine            size.Width = minsize;Di2015NewLine            size.Height = (size.Width * img.Height + img.Width - 1) / img.Width;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        return new Bitmap(img, size);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine

16000350Di2015UniqueSeparatorstatic DateTime? Search(List<string> lines)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    if (lines.Count == 0)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        return null;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    DateTime parsedDate;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // the first successful strategy will 'short circuit' the rest so they don't runDi2015NewLine    if(TryGetDateStrategy1(lines, out parsedDate)Di2015NewLine        || TryGetDateStrategy2(lines, out parsedDate)Di2015NewLine        || etc. etc.) Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        return parsedDate;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    return null;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineprivate static bool TryGetDateStrategy1(List<string> lines, out DateTime? date)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    var dateField = lines.Last().Split(';')[19].Trim('\\'').Trim();Di2015NewLine    DateTime parsedDate;Di2015NewLine    if (DateTime.TryParseExact(dateField, "MM'/'dd'/'yy HH:mm:ss", null, DateTimeStyles.AllowWhiteSpaces,out date))Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        date = parsedDate;Di2015NewLine        return true;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    return false;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineprivate static bool  TryGetDateStrategy2(List<string> lines, out DateTime? date)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    var dateField = lines.Last().Split(';')[18].Trim('\\'').Trim();Di2015NewLine    DateTime parsedDate;Di2015NewLine    if (DateTime.TryParseExact(dateField, "MM'/'dd'/'yy HH:mm:ss", null, DateTimeStyles.AllowWhiteSpaces, out date))Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        date = parsedDate;Di2015NewLine        return true;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    return null;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

16003299Di2015UniqueSeparator public DialogResult AttemptToSave(Context Db)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        tryDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine             Db.SaveChanges();Di2015NewLine             return DialogResult.OK;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine         }  Di2015NewLine        catch (DbEntityValidationException ex)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                var msg = String.Format("{0} \\n {1}",Di2015NewLine                    ex.EntityValidationErrors.First().ValidationErrors.First().ErrorMessage,Di2015NewLine                 ChangeInfoMessage(Db));Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                return MessageBox.Show(text: msg, caption: "Unable to save", buttons: MessageBoxButtons.RetryCancel);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public string ChangeInfoMessage(Context Db)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var adapter = (IObjectContextAdapter) Db;Di2015NewLine        adapter.ObjectContext.DetectChanges();Di2015NewLine        int NumAdded = Db.ChangeTracker.Entries().Count(e => e.State == EntityState.Added);Di2015NewLine        int NumModified = Db.ChangeTracker.Entries().Count(e => e.State == EntityState.Modified);Di2015NewLine        int NumDeleted = Db.ChangeTracker.Entries().Count(e => e.State == EntityState.Deleted);Di2015NewLine        return String.Format("{0} additions, {1} changes {2} deletions", NumAdded, NumModified, NumDeleted);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine

16004845Di2015UniqueSeparatorFileDownload
16004845Di2015UniqueSeparatorsource
16004845Di2015UniqueSeparatordestination
16004845Di2015UniqueSeparatorchunkSize
16004845Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic class FileDownloadDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    private volatile bool _allowedToRun;Di2015NewLine    private string _source;Di2015NewLine    private string _destination;Di2015NewLine    private int _chunkSize;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private Lazy<int> _contentLength;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public int BytesWritten { get; private set; }Di2015NewLine    public int ContentLength { get { return _contentLength.Value; } }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public bool Done { get { return ContentLength == BytesWritten; } }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public FileDownload(string source, string destination, int chunkSize)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        _allowedToRun = true;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        _source = source;Di2015NewLine        _destination = destination;Di2015NewLine        _chunkSize = chunkSize;Di2015NewLine        _contentLength = new Lazy<int>(() => Convert.ToInt32(GetContentLength()));Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        BytesWritten = 0;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private long GetContentLength()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var request = (HttpWebRequest)WebRequest.Create(_source);Di2015NewLine        request.Method = "HEAD";Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        using (var response = request.GetResponse())Di2015NewLine            return response.ContentLength;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private async Task Start(int range)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (!_allowedToRun)Di2015NewLine            throw new InvalidOperationException();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        var request = (HttpWebRequest)WebRequest.Create(_source);Di2015NewLine        request.Method = "GET";Di2015NewLine        request.UserAgent = "Mozilla/4.0 (compatible; MSIE 6.0; Windows NT 5.2; .NET CLR 1.0.3705;)";Di2015NewLine        request.AddRange(range);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        using (var response = await request.GetResponseAsync())Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            using (var responseStream = response.GetResponseStream())Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                using (var fs = new FileStream(_destination, FileMode.Append, FileAccess.Write, FileShare.ReadWrite))Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    while (_allowedToRun)Di2015NewLine                    {Di2015NewLine                        var buffer = new byte[_chunkSize];Di2015NewLine                        var bytesRead = await responseStream.ReadAsync(buffer, 0, buffer.Length);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                        if (bytesRead == 0) break;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                        await fs.WriteAsync(buffer, 0, bytesRead);Di2015NewLine                        BytesWritten += bytesRead;Di2015NewLine                    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                    await fs.FlushAsync();Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public Task Start()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        _allowedToRun = true;Di2015NewLine        return Start(BytesWritten);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public void Pause()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        _allowedToRun = false;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
16004845Di2015UniqueSeparatorstatic void Main(string[] args)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    var fw = new FileDownload("http://download.microsoft.com/download/E/E/2/EE2D29A1-2D5C-463C-B7F1-40E4170F5E2C/KinectSDK-v1.0-Setup.exe", @"D:\\KinetSDK.exe", 5120);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // Display progress...Di2015NewLine    Task.Factory.StartNew(() =>Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        while (!fw.Done)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            Console.SetCursorPosition(0, Console.CursorTop);Di2015NewLine            Console.Write("ContentLength: {0} | BytesWritten: {1}", fw.ContentLength, fw.BytesWritten);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    });Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // Start the download...Di2015NewLine    fw.Start();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // Simulate pause...Di2015NewLine    Thread.Sleep(500);Di2015NewLine    fw.Pause();Di2015NewLine    Thread.Sleep(2000);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // Start the download from where we left, and when done print to console.Di2015NewLine    fw.Start().ContinueWith(t => Console.WriteLine("Done"));Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    Console.ReadKey();Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
